subject: War of the First Coalition
object: 20 April 1792 - 17 October 1797 | (5 years, 5 months and 4 weeks)

subject: War of the First Coalition
object: France, Central Europe, Italy, Belgium, Netherlands, Spain, West Indies

subject: War of the First Coalition
object: French victory; Treaty of Paris, Peace of Basel, Treaty of Campo Formio | Establishment and survival of the French Republic | Hostilities resume in 1798 with the formation of a Second Coalition against France

subject: War of the First Coalition
object: French annexation of the Austrian Netherlands, the Left Bank of the Rhine, and other smaller territories | Several French "sister republics" established

subject: War of the First Coalition
object: Part of the French Revolutionary Wars and the Coalition Wars

subject: Casualties and losses
object: 94,000 soldiers killed in combat | ~282,000 died of disease | 220,000 captured | 100,000 wounded

subject: Casualties and losses
object: 100,000 soldiers killed in combat | ~300,000 died of disease | 150,000 captured
